# path

**Instance Property**

An array of coordinate objects representing the path of the route.

## Declaration

```swift
get path(): Coordinate[][];
```

## Discussion

An array of coordinates that reflect the complete path of the route, including all of its steps. To render this route on a map, set the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/PolylineOverlay/points] property of a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/PolylineOverlay] to this array.

## Route geometry

- **polyline**: An instance of a polyline overlay that represents the path of a route.
